about_the_game:
Zeleny woke up from a deep sleep and can’t remember anything. Join him as he discovers what had happened while exploring a maze-like 2D world full of dangers.

Zeleny Grimn is a Metroidvania Run N’ Gun video game. You’ll play Zeleny, a small creature, as you explore a vast world filled with dangers and unsolved mysteries.

Explore

Scout the maze-like paths and test your skills against various dangers.

Obtain new skills

Get new skills that will help you tackle whatever comes your way.

You may enhance your skills and equip them with objects that will boost your attacks even further.

Face great dangers

You’ll be able to overcome all your enemies. Showcase your skills by defeating them in combat.

Confront numerous enemies with diverse mechanics, each more powerful than the last.

Characteristics

  • 8 Shot Types

  • Skill Upgrades

  • Power-Ups

  • Comic-Style Kinematics

  • Expansive World to Explore

Zeleny Grimn is a Metroidvania Run N’ Gun video game. You’ll play Zeleny, a small creature, as you explore a vast world filled with dangers and unsolved mysteries.

name: Zeleny Grimn Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-12100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join Zeleny on his adventure through the Dardaglia region and unveil all the mysteries hidden within it. Explore maze-like paths and test yourself as you face numerous dangers while unlocking new skills.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
